messages.message: Peaks to Keep from Previous Spectrum

Unselect any peaks you would not like to keep.
Select peaks peaks you would like to keep.
Keep only new peaks assigned to {1}
Peaks not updated, spectrum has changed.

message.div:
Searching for peaks - this may take a bit.
You can close this dialog and when the search is done, you will be notified
Current detector response does not contain FWHM info.

messages.message: Failed to refit peak (became insignificant), from {1} to {2} peaks
There was no peak to to set to gamma's energy
There was no reference gamma energy to set the peaks mean to.
Failed to refit peak after fixing mean to reference photopeak. A peak became insignificant; from {1} to {2} peaks.

Changing the continuum type to {1} caused {2} peak to become insignificant.
Please use the Peak Editor to make this change.

Naively changing the continuum type to {1} caused the peak to become insignificant.
Please use the Peak Editor to make this change.
Peak in ROI at {1} keV is not Gaussian defined - please change this in the Peak Editor before setting a skew type.

Changing the skew type to {1} caused {2} peak to become insignificant.
Please use the Peak Editor to make this change.

Naively changing the skew type to {1} caused the peak to become insignificant.
Please use the Peak Editor to make this change.
